summary: In 1973, Hollywood actor Bing Russell starts an independent minor league baseball team in Portland consisting of outcasts and misfits, and turns them into unlikely overnight success.
cast: Todd Field|Kurt Russell|Rob Nelson|Jim Swanson|Frank Peters|Robert Richardson|Carren Woods|Jon Yoshiwara|Jim Bouton|Johnny Carson|Joe Garagiola|Joe Garza|Bing Russell|Max Patkin
title: The Battered Bastards of Baseball
